Content.Text:
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm-mm! What a darling little face. Ohoho!
Pardon me, honey, I meant it as a sincere
compliment.
<PAGE>
This is the clinic, <MYNAME>. Is something the
matter?
<PAGE>
Veronica's told me all about you. My name is
<BLUE>Marian</BLUE>. Don't forget about me, mmkay?
<PAGE>
If you're ever feeling sick or running low on
stamina, come right to see me.
<PAGE>
I have all sorts of medicine to help you feel
better, so talk to me any time the clinic is open.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the clinic, <MYNAME>. Is
something the matter? Just tell me where it
hurts.
<PAGE>
You might feel fine right now, but don't hesitate
to come see me if you feel sick or low on
stamina.
<PAGE>
I have all sorts of medicine to help you feel
better, so talk to me anytime the clinic is open.
...It looks like the clinic isn't open right now.
